author: Gul Tuysuz, Arwa Damon, Zaher Jaber and Eyad Kourdi, CNN
title: Rebel-held Syria braces for coronavirus 'tsunami' -- without soap, running water or the prospect of social distancing
description: Everything Fatima Um Ali needs to protect herself and her family from the novel coronavirus is out of reach. There is no running water, soap is expensive and hand sanitizer is an unaffordable luxury. She cannot even imagine what social distancing for her fami…
